about.label: About
about.content:
Welcome to InfoAlamedaCounty

This data warehouse and mapping system was built by Urban Strategies Council's Research & Tech program. This tool is intended to further our goals of democratizing data and providing open government through transparency and accountability and the use of data to support data-driven decision making in our community.

(Our Map Room was built using technology generously donated by ESRI)

help.label: About
help.content:
Welcome to InfoAlameda County

If you are having problems working the site, there are a couple of ways to find help.

On the website for this mapping tool (infoalamedacounty.org), there is a comprehensive guide for the entire system. You can find this by going through the sites help option in the main menu.

In addition to this guide, each tool has a specific help menu that can be accessed by when the tool is opened by clicking on the question mark icon located at the top right corner of the tool.

Finally, we encourage you to either send us an email (it(at)urbanstrategies.org) or contact us directly (510.893.2404) to schedule a training.
